name: Sany? Pachinko Paradise
description:
Sany? Pachinko Paradise is the first title in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features reproductions of two pachinko machines made by Sanyo bussan: CR Umi Monogatari S5 and CR Boukenjima. There are two standard modes available: Ts?j? (Normal) mode allows the player to modify a wide range of settings for each machine, while Jissen (Battle) mode challenges the player to win as many balls as possible on the default settings with a limited starting pool and time limit. There is also a View mode where the various animations that play on the in-game display can be freely viewed.

In addition, there is also a Pachi-Pro (Story) mode called Doki Doki Pachinko Monogatari: Mezase!! Pachinko Senshuken where the player takes the role of a college student who wants to become a professional pachinko player. He must practice his skills under the guidance his coaches, three beautiful young women, training to take part in a pachinko tournament and take on the so-called Don of the pachinko world, Mr. T. This mode combines the pachinko play with a basic time-management simulation game that includes mini-games and a pachinko quiz.
